texts.name: Illyanis
texts.biography: Illianis is a descendant of wild sirens. With her blood, she is immune to their cries and considers them the best soldiers. The sirens have been known to perform any of her requests faster than the wind. The main features of Illianis are her subtle tactical flair and her ruthlessness to her enemies.

specialty.name: Siren
specialty.description: Increases Speed of any Siren by 1 and their Attack and defense skills by 5% for every 3 levels (rounded up).
